basicInfo.courseTitle: The complete full-stack web development bootcamp
basicInfo.desc: Become a Full-Stack Web Developer with just ONE course. HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, React, PostgreSQL, Web3 and DApps.

reviewers.name: Alex K.
reviewers.review: Working at Sam.AI has been an incredible journey so far. The technology we're building is truly cutting-edge, and being a part of a team that's revolutionizing how people achieve their goals is immensely fulfilling.
